Con las ultimas actualizaciones han mejorado notablemente el juego, permitiendo que las 2 partes killer y survivor sean disfrutables. 10/10  mas si juegas con amigos.

If they can implement better system to report cheaters and hackers it would be much much better.

But for a 20 dollar base games, it was actually above expectation of what one can get out of it, and the variety of killers and survivors characters is pretty amazing for a somewhat unknown brand and company behind it.

Good!!
Muito divertido

Update: I've changed my mind over the last year. 
I'm just tired of it. I don't feel like there are any "good" players left. The community has become so toxic it makes me sad. The majority of the survivors I play with/against are pallet hopping, squat ghosting, griefing pos. I don't blame killer mains for being brutal "face campers".  I would throw these idiots on the hooks myself to help the killer at this point.

I blame half of it on the devs for not fixing some of the core gameplay issues. They got close to greatness but I've lost faith that they are actually going to change anything of value this far from release.
The other half goes to the trolls who are so focused on point hoarding they try to justfy their behavior by telling others they just need to git gud aka, exploit every whatever they can to ruin the experience for everyone else.

This game has lost it's original spirit.  Now it's about the same as every other online experience, full of 12 year olds who know your mom.

I got my moneys worth at least.


Original:
After 300+ hours of play I still catch myself holding a breath as the killer passes mere inches from my hiding spot or leaning into the screen to look around corners looking for survivors.  

This game has great elements:

-Well designed music/effects that raise your heartrate and inspire paranoia/fear
-A wide variety of playable characters to match your style
-Many maps and variations of each to keep the element of the unknown

As usual, the main issue with this game is *some* players. Do yourself a favor and skip the aftermatch chat 99.9% of the time.  Whoever died/loses whines about it being unfair/how dare others not save them/they only died because X didn't or did Y and it's not fair. Whoever wins acts like they are pro level and you must be an idiot for not winning. There's the Youtube troll vid crew being, well, you know.
AKA The usual multi online experience.

Yes. This game has bugs and balance issues but the devs do regularly put out patches/updates, in addition to new survivors/killers/maps/perks stirring the pot frequently. No. It's not perfect. No, there is not reward/reason for ranking up yet........*hint,hint*

If you play sans the meta soup it is an enjoyable, nail biting experience with a solid group of invested players that will keep you coming back for more.

muito foda

Your a teen or adult that needs to escape with a killer on the run. Survive with 3 other friend's or stranger to fix generators and get out from the exits. Fun when you don't take it too seriously with friends. Hope for the best that the killer doesn't find you at the start.

Pros:
-new content
-making/meeting new friends
-fun to play survive with friends

Cons: 
-killers that camp your hooked friends
-survivors rush generators
-bad matchmaking
-solo = not that fun
-bugs, glitches like any other games

Can be buggy and down right glitched at times but is fun. I especially enjoy it when I play with friends, even if we all die. Even if I hate playing against some killers, I still enjoy playing. Even After all the updates and changes since I started playing, I still find joy in playing. Although I get more joy playing with friends. :)

One of the few good Horror games out these days. BUT it's not calibrated and fair, for example: the Killer doesn't have a better chance to take all Survivors. So that's why you will find too many camping killers and people avoid usually to play as Killer including me. Devs should try to make this game as fair as possible for both survivors and Killers. Also new modes maybe can be added to have more fun.
Pretty good job so far!

This game is extremely fun to play with friends. Although, there are times where it is glitchy when trying to start a game together and you have to create a lobby together every singe time, it is definately a better expierence with friends. Now that that's said, some of the DLC Killers are a bit overpowered, but the more that you play against them, the more you learn how to avoid and escape them. It is all part of the expierence. It is a fun game and worth the money.
